goal.en: -Students have a preliminary understanding of Vietnam‘s cultural characteristics, such as major cities, food, clothing, housing, and transportation in Vietnam; -Learn the method of Vietnamese pinyin: 29 letters, tones, vowels, consonants, rhymes, and pronunciation of words; - Learn Vietnamese appellations and how to use them when meeting and getting to know each other; - Learn Vietnamese numbers and apply them to ask time, date, quantity of items, shopping prices, etc.; - Learn to introduce family members and self-introduction (nationality, age, occupation, interests, etc.); - Learn to use Vietnamese in general life situations, such as asking for directions, taking a ride, shopping, going to the market to buy ingredients, ordering food in restaurants, etc.
goal.ch: －學生初步認識越南的文化特色，例如：越南各大城市、食、衣、住、行的文化習俗； －學會越南拼音方法：29字母、聲調、母音、子音、韻音、看字讀音； －學會越南稱謂及應用在出次見面、互相認識、打招呼； －學會越南數字及應用數字問時間、日期、物品的數量、購物價格等； －學會介紹家庭成員和自我介紹（國籍、年齡、職業、興趣等）； －學會使用越南語在一般生活情境、如問路、搭車、購物、去市場買食材、餐廳點餐等。

content.en: This course combines the cultural introduction and language learning model to allow students to understand Vietnamese initially. The study mainly introduces the most commonly used languages in daily life, such as general social expressions, greetings, using numbers, date and time, family members, career, self-introduction, shopping, food, transportation, weather, and other topics. Classes use repeated oral exercises to help students become familiar with Vietnamese pronunciation and master essential Vietnamese communication. This course will also introduce the Vietnamese cultural characteristics in this field according to each teaching topic so that students will naturally be interested in Vietnam.
content.ch: 本課程結合文化介紹及語言學習模式初步讓學員認識越南語。課程主要介紹生活周遭最常用的語言、如一般社交用語、打招呼、應用數字、日期與時間、家庭成員、職業、自我介紹、購物、美食、交通、天氣等主題。上課以反覆口說練習方式、協助學員熟悉越南的發音及能掌握基礎的越南語溝通。本課程依每個教學主題也會一起介紹該領域的越南文化特色讓學員自然對越南感到有趣。
